pred_steps: "Operator initiates the service to enter laboratory anagrafica.",
"Operator fills out the form with laboratory details.",
"Operator confirms data entry.",
"System verifies entered data.",
"System stores/records the data.",
"System provides feedback on successful completion."

"Operator initiates the deletion of a visit", "Accesses the visit record to delete", "Confirms the selection of the visit to delete", "Deletes the visit record", "Verifies the deletion of the visit", "Notifies operator that the deletion process is complete"
1. The operator initiates the process of entering examination details.
2. The system displays a form or interface for recording examination details.
3. Operator inputs necessary examination details, including patient information, examination type, results, etc.
4. Operator confirms the input of examination details.
5. System verifies the entered data for accuracy and completeness.
6. If any discrepancies or errors are found, system displays an error message and prompts operator to correct the data.
7. Once data is verified and confirmed, system stores the examination details.
8. System generates and displays a notification to the operator that the examination has been successfully recorded.
9. System updates the database with the new examination details.

"Receive confirmation prompt to delete the selected examination.",
"Delete the selected examination from the system.",
"Notify the operator that the deletion of examination has been completed successfully."
